website_summaries.verdict: This electric cordless trimmer is powerful and efficient. Offers the versatility of a professional-grade gas machine without the hassle and fumes.
pros: The 56-volt Lithium-ion battery is more brawny than most and can be shared with other EGO tools
Boasts a variable speed trigger and an oversized cutting swath to get work done faster
Capable of covering large yards on one charge
cons: Some owners say replacement spools are hard to use

customer_reviews.title: One of the best trimmers I ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome weed trimmer, I've had used gas trimmers and they work good. But comparing to this battery powered trimmer, I can say it's the best trimmer I owned! I have a large 7 acre land with a lot of trees, with the lightweight of this trimmer I can get done trimming quicker. Now the only down side I have with the trimmer is the battery doesn't keep it charge long but hey I rather sit and wait for the battery to charge then mix gas. One last thing is having this trimmer or anything battery powered, your not polluting the earth with that nasty gas!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Long

customer_reviews.title: Ego has great products but watch which sellers that you buy them from
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but don’t get it from Jack Small Engines. I returned the trimmer looking to get the carbon one & they won’t give me my refund. They have the most terrible customer service that I’ve ever received on Amazon & Amazon themselves are dragging the investigation into why I haven’t received my refund. It’s been a month & I’m not happy at all. I won’t buy anything from them ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Had trouble with this product
customer_reviews.text: The line kept breaking. I tried some new line , but it did not work either. I solved the problem by spraying lubricant in the head mechanics. Now it functions correctly and doesn't break the line.
customer_reviews.author: Gustang

customer_reviews.title: CHANGING FROM 5 STAR TO 1 STAR
customer_reviews.text: The weed wacker was amazing UNTIL I NEEDED TO REWIND THE SPOOL. I AM QUITE STRONG BUT MY HANDS ARE TOO SMALL AND NOT STRONG ENOUGH TO TURN THE SPOOL. SO NO GOOD TO ME WHATSOEVER. This was the review before i needed to rewind it. I am a 60’year old Woman. I have been scared of weed wackers. This one is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley J.

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and bulky
customer_reviews.text: Given the rave reviews of this product, I thought I would replace my Worx trimmer. As a 70 year old woman, I have been mowing and trimming my yard for Over 40 years. This product is much too heavy for me and not at all easy to maneuver. How many of those reviews were written by women? It has to go back. PLUS, there is a 20% restocking fee!!! This was a bad choice all around and has cost me dearly.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle G. Mather

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wish I would have given up on the gas powered trimmers a long time ago....
customer_reviews.author: Bert C.

customer_reviews.title: Performed as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied so far, but I've only used it 3 times. Appears to be very well made and does the job in my small yard! Plenty of cutting power.
customer_reviews.author: SierraRick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent string trimmer
customer_reviews.text: It is very powerful and whacked through tall weeds. No problem. The battery lasts an hour or more. Not super-light but certainly not very heavy. Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Fred M. Cutrer

customer_reviews.title: the grounds keeper loves it lightweight easy to work with and provide professional
customer_reviews.text: the grounds keeper loves it lightweight easy to work with and provide professional appearance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lithium battery gives about 30 to 40 minutes of run time.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love the power and lithium battery. Works great. Quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Al Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my ego leaf blower and hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.author: 0U812

product_meta.title: ego POWER+ 15 in. Lithium ion Electric Cordless String Trimmer Kit with Rapid Reload Head (2.5Ah Battery, 210-Watt Charger)
product_meta.description: The number 1 customer complaint with any string trimmer is line replacement. EGO has taken this pain point away with the NEW EGO 15 in. Rapid Reload trimmer head. The 15 in. EGO POWER+ String trimmer features the new Rapid-Reload system to quickly and easily load new cutting line. The 15 in. cutting swath, bump-head line advancement and professional-grade 0.095 in. cutting line make quick word of yard clean ups. The advanced EGO Power+ 56-Volt 2.5Ah battery uses industry-leading Arc-Lithium technology to deliver Power Beyond Belief and is compatible with all EGO Power+ Products. Rapid reload head to quickly and easily load cutting line 15 in. cutting swath Dual-feed spiral-twist 0.095 in. line Hi-efficiency brushless motor Variable speed control Weather-resistant construction 2.5 Ah ARC lithium battery powers all EGO Power+ products 5 year limited warranty
feature_bullets: NEW Rapid Reload Head – Wind line in seconds Included 2.5 Ah battery, compatible with all EGO Power+ products Hi-efficiency brushless motor with variable speed control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars23 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
